code: import reactLogo from'./react.png';import reduxLogo from'./redux.png';import'./App.css';import Calculator from'./components/calculator';import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{appendSymbol,appendNum,back,equals,clear,decimal}from"./actions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){var dispatch=useDispatch();window.onkeydown=function(event){if(!isNaN(event.key)){dispatch(appendNum(event.key));}else if(event.key.toLowerCase()==="c"){dispatch(clear());}else if(event.key.toLowerCase()==="x"){dispatch(appendSymbol("*"));}else if(event.key==="."){dispatch(decimal());}else if(event.keyCode===8){dispatch(back());}else if(event.keyCode===13||event.key==="="){dispatch(equals());}else if(!event.key.match(/[a-z]/i)){dispatch(appendSymbol(event.key));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logos",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"App-logo",src:reactLogo,alt:"react-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"Redux-logo",src:reduxLogo,alt:"redux-logo"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"App-title",children:"Redux Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Calculator,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:"\xA9 Josh Wood - 2022"})]})});}export default App;
